definition: to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
lit. don't worry about not knowing goods, but about comparing them (proverb)/fig. goods' (or person's) true value can only be determined through comparison
pinyin: bu4 pa4 bu4 shi2 huo4 , zhi3 pa4 huo4 bi3 huo4
containing_words.word: 不怕不識貨，只怕貨比貨

definition: lit. it is not an official to be feared, but a person in direct control over sb (proverb)/fig. to be obliged to comply with people in authority
pinyin: bu4 pa4 guan1 , zhi3 pa4 guan3

definition: there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
containing_words.word: 世上無難事，只怕有心人

definition: lit. nothing is difficult on this earth, if your mind is set (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
containing_words.word: 天下無難事，只怕有心人

sentences.english: You do not so serious to me, I'm afraid I will betray you.
sentences.chinese: 請你別對我那麼認真，只怕我會背叛你。

sentences.english: Therefore, bumpy road ahead is not afraid, I am afraid that from the outset, the direction is going the wrong way.
sentences.chinese: 所以，不怕前路坎坷，只怕從一開始就走錯了方向。

sentences.english: Being right half the time beats being half-right all the time.
sentences.chinese: 不怕半生皆是謬誤，只怕一生似是而非。

sentences.english: Reading is not the night five drum, is work by fits and starts.
sentences.chinese: 讀不在三更五鼓，功只怕一曝十寒。

sentences.english: Love is a war, if I'm not afraid to hurt you would not happy.
sentences.chinese: 愛是一場戰爭，我不怕受傷只怕你不快樂。

sentences.english: Got your mind set on a dream.
sentences.chinese: 夢想可成真，只怕有心人。

sentences.english: I fear that I've broken your pen.
sentences.chinese: 只怕我已經弄壞你的筆了。

sentences.english: Loses all not to be fearful, feared that only feared we resist recall.
sentences.chinese: 失去一切都不可怕，怕只怕我們抵抗不過回憶。

sentences.english: Nothing in the world is difficult for one who sets his mind on it.
sentences.chinese: 世上無難事，只怕有心人。

sentences.english: The Chinese people believe there is nothing in the world that cannot be done for those who are really resolved.
sentences.chinese: 中國人相信“世上無難事，只怕有心人”。

sentences.english: They'll go for our 3) jugular if we give them the chance.
sentences.chinese: 若我們給他們機會，只怕我們連命都保不住。

sentences.english: I am not afraid I am afraid spend courage tattle and prate.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕流言蜚語我只怕花光勇氣。

sentences.english: Is multitudinous small miracle, I'm afraid to miss wayward away multitudinous.
sentences.chinese: 是沵小奇蹟，收起任性只怕錯過沵。

sentences.english: Maybe, even if I should wrap him with flatteries, he would not give it up!
sentences.chinese: 我就是給他連戴十頂高帽子，只怕也不管事。

sentences.english: Here is another day gone, and I am afraid that we may yet hear good news before we leave this country.
sentences.chinese: 若象這樣，只怕我們吃了喜蛋才能回去哩。

sentences.english: It was a stunning political debate that would be hard to imagine in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 如此令人稱奇的政治論辯在英國只怕不敢想象。

definition: hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
were it not for/if not for
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
